content: I don't have personal opinions or experiences of my own, but i can tell you that andalusia is a region full of hidden gems and lesser-known areas to explore. some examples of lesser-known gems of moorish architecture include the alcazar de los reyes cristianos in cordoba, the palacio de viana in cordoba, the casa del rey moro in ronda, and the alcazaba of almeria. these places offer a unique perspective on andalusian history and culture and are definitely worth exploring for those seeking off-the-beaten-path destinations.
